import React, { Component } from 'react' import Layout from "./Layout"; import { urlOfImages } from "./images"; import fetch from 'isomorphic-fetch'; class Query extends Component{ constructor() { super(); this.state = { questionList :[], answers : [] } } static async getInitialProps() { console.log('ran'); const res = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/questions/'); const questionList = await res.json(); console.log(questionList); return { questionList } } componentDidMount() { console.log(this.props.questionList); fetch('http://localhost:8000/questions/') .then(response => response.json()) .then((res)=>{ console.log(res.questionList); this.setState( {questionList : [...res.questionList]}); }) } renderQuestion(){ console.log(this.state.questionList); return (<> { this.state.questionList.map((question)=>{ return
{question.question} {this.renderAnswer(question)}
})} ); }; renderAnswer(question){ if(question.answers && question.answers.length == 0 ) { return (
Answers
No One Has Answered
) } else{ fetch('http://localhost:8000/questions/'+question._id) .then(response => response.json()) .then((res)=>{ console.log(res); this.setState( {answers : [...res.answers]}); }) return (
Answers {this.state.answers.map((answer)=>{
{answer.answer}
-- {answer.author.name}
})}
) } } render(){ return( {this.renderQuestion()}
